note: A_21 - angular transformation of simple matching coefficient
A_28 - coefficient of mean square contingency
A_30 - product-sum correlation coefficient or tetrachoric correlation

formula: (sqrt(a*d) + a - b - c)/(sqrt(a*d) + a + b + c)

note: S_8 - Sorensen with triple weight to double presences

formula: ((max(a,b) + max(c,d) + max(a,c) + max(b, d)) - (max(a+c,b+d) + max(a+b,c+d)))/(2*n - (max(a+c,b+d) + max(a+b,c+d)))
